snippet: North Carolina scored three goals in the second half to beat Penn State, 4-1, in San Diego and win its 21st women’s soccer N.C.A.A. championship.
abstract: North Carolina defeats Penn State, 4-1, to win its 21st women's soccer NCAA championship.
lead_paragraph: North Carolina scored three goals in the second half to beat Penn State, 4-1, in San Diego and win its 21st women’s soccer N.C.A.A. championship.

headline.seo: North Carolina Wins Women’s Soccer Title
headline.main: North Carolina Wins Women’s Soccer Title
